title: Covert Passion
description: Novella (64,000 words)Genre(s): Contemporary, Romance, Thriller, EroticaDevlin O’Malley is tormented by the memory of a time when he descended into darkness, taking an innocent woman with him and barely making it out alive. His work as a sex therapist is the only thing that keeps him going. Where he cannot help the one from his past, he can at least help others like her. His best friend thinks that someday one of his cases will be a breakthrough for him, will allow him to forgive himself and move on with his life. Devlin doesn’t agree. Until he takes on a client named Melissa and everything he thought he knew about himself, his past, and his present are put to a challenge. (M/F - For content labels and excerpt, see details on publisher's site.)
author: Ann Ruby
